department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Translation Bureau (the Bureau), is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) to meet its needs for in-person, hybrid and distance interpretation services on an  as and when required  basis and to support its various operational requirements for parliamentary and conference interpretation in both official languages.
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Translation Bureau (the Bureau), is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) to meet its needs for in-person, hybrid and distance interpretation services on an  as and when required  basis and to support its various operational requirements for parliamentary and conference interpretation in both official languages. We are seeking suppliers to provide theses interpretation services. Suppliers who hold an accreditation issued by the Bureau and able to meet the requirements under this RFP are invited to submit a bid. This requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The term of any subsequent contract will be for (1) year with one (1) irrevocable option period of one (1) year. There are security requirements associated with this requirement. For additional information, consult Part 6 - Security, Financial and Other Requirements, and Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses. For more information on personnel and organization security screening or security clauses, Bidders should refer to the Contract Security Program of Public Works and Government Services Canada (http://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/esc-src/introduction-eng.html) website.
full_summary:
**Procurement Notice**

**1. Reference and Bidding Information**

|  | English | French |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Reference Number | PW-__ZF-500-41477 | Numéro de référence : PW-__ZF-500-41477 |
| Solicitation Number | EN960-231030/B | Numéro de sollicitation : EN960-231030/B |
| Deadline for Bidding | 2023-08-15 | Date limite pour les soumissions: 2023-08-15 |
| Category | SRV | Categorie: SRV |

**2. Description of Requirement**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking a supplier to provide interpretation services for parliamentary and conference events in both official languages (English and French).

The successful supplier will provide services on an "as and when required" basis, utilizing a combination of in-person, hybrid, and distance interpretation methods.

The services requested are:

* Interpretation of parliamentary proceedings
* Interpretation of conference proceedings
* Translation of documents and other materials as required

**3. Response Overview**

The Response to this Request for Proposal will include:

* A detailed description of the interpretation services to be provided
* The supplier's experience and qualifications in providing interpretation services
* Proof of accreditation with the Translation Bureau
* A comprehensive pricing plan outlining the supplier's costs and rates
* Any additional documentation or information required to demonstrate the supplier's ability to meet the requirements of this proposal

**4. Evaluation and Selection**

Responses will be evaluated on the following criteria:

* Technical Merit (50%)
* Price (30%)
* Combination of Technical Merit and Price (20%)

**5. Exclusion and Eligibility**

To be eligible to bid on this procurement:

* Suppliers must have a valid accreditation with the Translation Bureau
* Suppliers must meet the requirements outlined in Part 6 of the Supplier Instruction Manual
* Suppliers who are not eligible to bid on this procurement will be excluded from the evaluation process.

**6. Contract Duration and Expiration**

The term of the resulting contract will be one (1) year, with an option to extend for an additional one (1) year.
